sentences.en: Bard 1000 Grants a constant , single category bonus to your reputation.
sentences.cn: 吟游诗人1000声誉更快发展(做好事加得更快,做坏事也减得到).

sentences.en: Check out our bard information page now!
sentences.cn: 浏览吟游诗人信息页面获取更多信息.

sentences.en: Gnomeo and Juliet is directed and co-written by animation veteran Kelly Asbury, who makes no apologies to William Shakespeare or to the bard's, perhaps, most malleable tale.
sentences.cn: 《格诺米欧和朱丽叶》的导演兼编剧是动漫老手凯利.阿斯博瑞，他对莎翁和古代的吟游诗人没有一丝愧疚之情，这大概是最具改编潜力的故事了。

sentences.en: Harbin was as the Bard because of ice and snow.
sentences.cn: 哈尔滨之所以称为冰城是因为有冰雕和雪景.

sentences.en: He was your bard, oh Sea!
sentences.cn: 哦,大海呀,是他曾经将你歌唱.

sentences.en: I do not mind more Bard work. I do not mind harder work.
sentences.cn: 我不在乎更多的困难工作. 我不在乎更困难的工作.

sentences.en: I don't mind more Bard work.
sentences.cn: 我不在乎更多的困难工作.

sentences.en: I find him, the wandering grey bard.
sentences.cn: 我发现了正在徘徊的衰老游唱诗人.

sentences.en: I'll use my bard song to help you concentrate!
sentences.cn: 我会用我的吟游诗人歌曲帮你集中精神！

sentences.en: J . Bard , I. R . Faulkner , Electrochemical Methods: Fundaments and Applications , Wily , New York, 2000.
sentences.cn: 胡启章, 电化学原理与方法,五南图书出版公司, 台北, 2002.

sentences.en: Lamartine was her favourite bard from the period when she first could feel.
sentences.cn: 从她开始懂得感情的时候起,拉马丁已成为她心爱的诗人.

sentences.en: Prerequisite: Bard, Virtue of Valor class feature.
sentences.cn: 前提: 吟游诗人, 勇气之德职业特性.

sentences.en: See Bardic Music in the bard class description.
sentences.cn: 见吟游诗人职业说明中吟唱能力.

sentences.en: The iron bard had been sawn ( clean ) through, and the prisoner had escaped.
sentences.cn: 铁栏栅被 ( 完全 ) 锯断了, 那犯人逃走了.

sentences.en: Then , gazing over the handkerchief , he said: -- The bard's noserag.
sentences.cn: 望着手绢说: “ ‘大诗人 ’ 的鼻涕布. ”

sentences.en: Though a bard like Shakespear, he certainly a way with words.
sentences.cn: 虽然不是诗人像莎士比亚, 他一定有办法的话.
